name: Clicking Game (BJL156)
description:
A game where the objective is to click as many black squares as possible. The game is no where close to completed.

Update (10/13/22):

- Power ups:

     - Green: Increase time by 2 seconds and add 2 points

     - Red: Decrease time by 2 seconds and subtract 2 points

Small Update (10/14/22):

- Bug fixed: click red button with one second left to get infinite time.

Made with:

- C++

- OpenGL

- My Brain
